General.Name: Clear Sale SA
General.Description: ClearSale S.A., through its subsidiaries, provides solutions and services for fraud prevention and management in Brazil and internationally. It serves e-commerce, financial market, direct sales, telecommunications, and insurance sector. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Achilles Orlando Curtolo, nº 349, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 01144-010
